price: (31) Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
